content: HI All, I've been trying to reconcile the website's reference to http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-drug-formulary/StructureDefinition/usdf-FormularyDrug versus http://hl7.org/fhir/us/Davinci-drug-formulary/StructureDefinition/usdf-FormularyDrug ... Which one is correct? (the upper case Davinci? ) thank you in advance, Paul

The profile says that the lower case is the correct one:

The official URL for this profile is:
http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-drug-formulary/StructureDefinition/usdf-FormularyDrug
Right, I ask as the StructureDefinitions have uppercase and the Examples as well. The site is correct, the downloads are not.
ah, that is interesting. @Saul Kravitz the downloaded examples have Davinci instead of davinci
Fascinating....everything validated...jumped through all IG publisher hoops. Bizarre.
Yeah - it was a bit strange, the webpage looks good, the zip looks different
thanks for confirming

@Paul Bastide no, you are not losing your mind ;-)
I shared it with the IG publisher folks.

FYI we found that these URI actually got flipped to uppercase in the continuous build version.
This is actually way worse than I thought. @Paul Bastide was very clear above, but for some reason I thought the issue was limited to examples. Nope, the published specification conflicts with itself. The website had d but the spec artifacts have D.
I am opening a ticket for it now.
@Lloyd McKenzie I think we might need you on this one. The website has lowercase d (everywhere, including the json and xml), but the conformance resources have capital d. Which one wins?
does "what is used in the other davinci IGs?" weigh in?
in either case, this is a very bad error and I think it demands a new technical correction release
@Dave Hill FYI this is the thread I mentioned /cc @Saul Kravitz
What's the URL inside the IG resource?
on the website or in the download?
Here is my initial report on #igcreation -- https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179252-IG-creation/topic/Strange.20case.20transition.20in.20DrugFormulary.20IG

when the structuredefinitions are downloaded: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/Davinci-drug-formulary/StructureDefinition/usdf-CoveragePlan
when they are viewed on the webpage: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-drug-formulary/StructureDefinition/usdf-CoveragePlan
I opened https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-28494 for this issue

Lloyd McKenzie said:

What's the URL inside the IG resource?

on the website, its lowercase d: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/Davinci-drug-formulary/ImplementationGuide-hl7.fhir.us.davinci-drug-formulary.html

in the download, uppercase:
image.png
And in Git?
@ryan moehrke said uppercase there, though i havn't double-checked it
My guess is that if you correct it to be lower-case in the IG in Git, that will fix it to be lowercase everywhere - which is what it should be.
i agree
I think my question is one of process
can that be done as a technical correction?
and we get a 1.0.1 with relative speed?
Yes, that would definitely fall under the scope of "technical correction". Relative speed is always relative... ;)
@Dave Hill please let me know if there's anything I can do to help drive this forward.
@Lee Surprenant Thanks Lee, we'll definitely include you in the conversation!

I assume this issue also applies to the StructureDefinition and urls for extensions too?
e.g.: "https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pdex-formulary/StructureDefinition-usdf-DrugTierDefinition-extension.html"
versus
the extension url is current set to be"http://hl7.org/fhir/us/Davinci-drug-formulary/StructureDefinition/usdf-DrugTierDefinition-extension"

Any ETA when this might be officially be changed in the IG?

@Lee Surprenant , are you available for today's Da Vinci PDex (Formulary, Plan-Net) call at Noon today EDT. I'm hoping to discuss the Formulary Jira ticket you filed. https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/514633709.
thanks Dave, will join
The jira ticket https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-28494 status = Resolved change required. Any timeline when the change will reflect in the website?
@Dave Hill a technical correction is in the works under the Pharmacy WG

Saul Kravitz said:

Dave Hill a technical correction is in the works under the Pharmacy WG

Thanks Saul

Dave Hill said:

Lee Surprenant , are you available for today's Da Vinci PDex (Formulary, Plan-Net) call at Noon today EDT. I'm hoping to discuss the Formulary Jira ticket you filed. https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/514633709.

Is there any page with this IG meeting details (i.e., when, at what time, etc.)?
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/DVP/PDex+Meetings
